paragraph: Call For A Free Consultation Available 24/7. 800-800-4600

detailsData.title: FREE CONSULTATION
detailsData.content: We offer free consultations 24/7 and there will always be someone here to take your call. This ensures you can get legal advice whenever you need it.

detailsData.title: EXPERIENCED LAWYERS
detailsData.content: With over 35 years of experience, our team has a proven track record of success, having recovered over a billion dollars for our clients.

detailsData.title: NO FEE PROMISE
detailsData.content: Our firm works on a contingency fee basis, meaning you don't pay us anything unless we recover money for you.

detailsData.title: AWARD-WINNING FIRM
detailsData.content: Recognized for our commitment to clients, we have been awarded 'Best Personal Injury Law' and 'Best Law Firm' in multiple locations.

valueProp: Hughes & Coleman has over 35 years of experience representing the rights of injured victims in Kentucky and Tennessee. We pride ourselves on always putting our clients first and providing excellent customer service. We’re passionate about getting big dollar results for our clients and we have the experience and results to prove it.
CTA: Call For A Free Consultation Available 24/7. 800-800-4600

testimonalData.text: Hughes & Coleman not only met my expectations, but fully exceeded them. They were very professional and responsive whenever I contacted them.
testimonalData.author: Judy

testimonalData.text: This has been a good experience at a difficult time. They are an excellent team. Thank you for your support.
testimonalData.author: Pamela

testimonalData.text: Hughes & Coleman were instrumental in getting the compensation I needed from my accident. Now I can concentrate on the care I need.
testimonalData.author: Sarah
